name: 2-oxoglutarate:[dihydrolipoyllysine-residue succinyltransferase]-lipoyllysine 2-oxidoreductase (decarboxylating, acceptor-succinylating)
comment: 2-oxoglutarate dehydrogenase complex: oxoglutarate dehydrogenase a part of multi-step reaction (see R08549, R01700+R02570+R07618) subsequently R02570 TPP-dependent enzyme (see R00621+R03316)
